original_text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death, we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection:
korean_text: 만일 우리가 그의 죽으심과 같은 모양으로 연합한 자가 되었으면 또한 그의 부활과 같은 모양으로 연합한 자도 되리라

sentences.original_text: For if we have been planted together
in the likeness of his death,
in the likeness of his resurrection:
